article_title: Crossroads Center opens thrift store so ‘everybody wins’
article_text:
We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us, but did not find one.

Please click the button below to Start a new print or online subscription.

article_metadata.description: KEARNEY — The Lord works in mysterious ways, Jerry Bumgardner believes. For proof, he points to the new thrift store that will open at 9 a.m. Monday at Crossroads Center at 1404 W. 39th St. where he is executive director.
